titles.title: A concurrent resolution marking the fourth anniversary of the closing of ABC Color, the only independent newspaper of Paraguay; condemning the refusal of the Government of Paraguay to permit the reopening of ABC Color; and urging the Government of Paraguay to guarantee freedom of the press.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Called up by House by Special Order.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 3/3/1988--Introduced. Condemns the continued refusal of the Government of Paraguay to permit the reopening of ABC Color and urges that Government to allow ABC Color to reopen, to guarantee freedom of the press, and to allow the Paraguayan people to exercise their rights under the Paraguayan Constitution.
